CodeList.Name: Bowel Control Scale Test Code

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you been constipated?
Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you lost control of your bowels or had an accident?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BWCS - Lost Control of Your Bowels

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you almost lost control of your bowels or almost had an accident?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BWCS - Almost Lost Control of Your Bowels

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you altered your activities because of bowel control problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BWCS - Altered Activities Because Bowel Control Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how much have bowel problems restricted your overall lifestyle?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BWCS - Bowel Problems Restrict Overall Lifestyle

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Bowel Control Scale Test Code Terminology
